text:
I would suggest that you join a Discord Vfx channel that a friend of mine has started: Keep Calm I am in VFX: <https://discord.gg/WEMxnz|https://discord.gg/WEMxnz>

He has started challenges, there is a podcast and tomorrow evening there will be a realtime Netflix party with a VFX supe commenting a film he has worked on live. 

There are more than 1500 from around the world now.

attachments.title: Join the Keep Calm, I'm in VFX Discord Server!
attachments.text: Check out the Keep Calm, I'm in VFX community on Discord - hang out with 1,563 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.
attachments.fallback: Discord: Join the Keep Calm, I'm in VFX Discord Server!
